message.body: Why thank you! That was an oldie but goodie. Haven't worn it in a while. I totally did it again and passed out last night/this morning. Now I'm up again too early again! Argh.
Lol you now have an ok sleep cycle. I don't see the problem
Good morning ^_^
Hahah good morning!!! Hope you're doing well. I suddenly want Bambu.
Clear your Friday night and let's grab some later
We can clean out their inventory
That is certainly ambitious.
I'm the type to stick to what I already know and like. How many have you tried from there?
Let's see. The hulk smash. The one that you like a lot. This pineapple orange slushie. Durian smoothie.
Is the hulk smash the one made with avocado?
Yeah it's just smashed avocado with shaved ice
Which I enjoy very much.
I had that one, but it had jello in it.
Did that ruin it for you?
Kind of.
The drink was pretty think so it made it hard to suck the jello out.
I think it's meant to be spooned out. With the given contents. Until the ice melts completely. I rarely use the straw for that one.
What's your plan for today?
That makes sense.
Well I fell back asleep, so I feel more rested. Going to do laundry and make some phone calls.
Busy girl coming through! Everyone look out!
Well change of plans. My sister just called, I'll be with the boys later.
Ah. That's a bummer. Did you have to cancel on anyone?
Luckily no. But probably not going to do Bambu later.
How's Friday? Are you easy for the weekend?
Baby I'm always easy. Ok sorry. Very inappropriate lolol
*ready!
Aww I can't easily walk to get bambu anymore
Hahahah!
Yea, that's a downer.
Yeah I'm ready. Gym time to make up for last night's meal. More settling into the apartment. And pretending I'm not sad Uyen is leaving
We're you able to do any errands or did you have to go to your sister's right when she called?
Didn't really get to do the stuff I wanted to get done off my mental list today.
That's a damper of sorts. I'll leave you to your devices for now. I'll return to bother you later.
"To my devices"...alright hahah. Well I got them both to nap, I feel victorious.
What did you interpret the devices statement as? I'm sitting alone at a French wine bar called vintage. Pretty nice wine cellar feel with pockets if modern chic splashed in
That's a pretty vague term in this context. I just took it as whatever I'm doing.
Oh fancy. Pretty classy way to spend a Friday evening.
That was the idea lol. Thanks. I think I'll try to explore side I work here and all. I'd ask you to join but you're with the cutie pies lol
Where is the place located? A wine bar would be so wasted on me hahah.
They have nice food though :)
I'll show you when I get to an outlet. I'm sitting on 3 percent
How are things with the kiddies?
ï¿¼
Their parents came home so I went home. Watching tv now. How was your wins outing?
Indifferent. I found a different brand of wine I like. However the soup I ordered want good. It was over sales and it was a very simple soup I could've made myself
Wasn't*
What are you watching?
Dark Knight Rises
Great choice. I'll let you enjoy then
That's too bad, I'm sure you'll find another wine bar you'll like.
There are a couple. Heh just not a good idea because a glass costs as much as the bottle if you were to buy at the store
Drinking could be an expensive hobby.
Tell me about it. My favorite scotch is about 100 a pop
Per glass or bottle?
Bottle.
There are many alternatives for much less but I know which one I like
I probably wouldn't be able to tell the difference.
